thread.title: Finance Business Partner

title: Finance Business Partner
text:
Job Ref: 11419 
We are seeking a highly commercial, qualified accountant (ACA, ACCA, CIMA) with the gravitas and influence to be able to advise on and direct strategy in a key business-facing position with one of our clients. 
The firm are highly celebrated in their market, and can offer a dynamic, progressive environment in which to develop your career and exercise your talents as a financial business partner. 
The successful applicant will have proven ability to interpret financial results and KPI’s in order to support sound commercial decision making and to help the business meet and exceed its financial and strategic objectives. You will have the confidence to influence and challenge key stakeholders within the firm, whilst remaining diplomatic and showing genuine commitment to understanding the workings and overall objectives of the business. 
If you’re currently working within a Financial Analyst, Commercial Accounting or similar position and are looking for a role offering greater scope to make an impact, this could be just the role. 
Whilst a background in a professional services business is desirable, our client will also consider strong applications from other corporate environments. 
To find out more about this opportunity please apply now or contact Richard Hooper for a confidential discussion. 
Balance Recruitment is an award winning Recruitment Agency and is advertising this opportunity on behalf of a client. We are an equal opportunities employer, committed to promoting diversity. 
We endeavour to reply to all applications within 3 working days, however due to very high levels of response for certain positions, it is unfortunately not always possible to respond to every unsuccessful application.
